thinking: The user has initiated a conversation with a simple greeting. I will respond appropriately and prepare to assist with any technical tasks or questions they may have.

present.content:
Hello! I'm Cline, your advanced system engineering assistant. How can I help you today? I can assist with tasks like: - Executing CLI commands - Reading and editing files - Debugging code - Setting up development environments - And much more!
Please let me know what you need help with.
